snippet: The government’s dire straits have largely been caused by the failure of Arab countries to send aid, Prime Minister Salam Fayyad said.
abstract: Palestinian Prime Min Salam Fayyad says government is in 'extreme jeopardy' because of financial crisis caused by Arab countries' failure to send hundreds of millions of dollars in promised aid.
lead_paragraph: The government’s dire straits have largely been caused by the failure of Arab countries to send aid, Prime Minister Salam Fayyad said.

headline.seo: Palestinian Authority Threatened by Fiscal Crisis, Premier Says
headline.main: Palestinian Authority in Crisis Over Finances, Premier Says
headline.print_headline: Palestinian Authority in Crisis Over Finances, Premier Says
